name: radioOptions
description: The array of radio inputs for more table options. Maximum allowed radio inputs are 2.

params.name: title
params.description: Title of the first option.

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the first option

name: disableSort
description: True for disable sorting for every column

name: maxRowsView
description: Limit maximum count of showed rows. More rows will be visible with scrolling

params.name: text
params.description: Text for download button

params.name: href
params.description: Link for download button

params.name: text
params.description: Text for print table button

params.name: text
params.description: Text for source

params.name: name
params.description: Name of source

params.name: href
params.description: Link for source of table content if exists

name: firstCellIsHeader
description: If set to true, first cell in table row will be a TH instead of a TD.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the table container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table container.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignore

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use "numeric".

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the table head cell.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table cell.

params.name: disableSort
params.description: True if sorting is not allowed for this column

name: rows
description: Array of table rows and cells.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignore

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use "numeric".

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the table row cell.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table cell.
